title: Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 2 eggs, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Crack the eggs into a bowl. 2. Add salt and pepper. 3. Scramble the eggs in a hot pan.

title: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, Parmesan cheese
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti. 2. Fry the pancetta. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine everything.

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: Chicken breast, lettuce, tomatoes, dressing
instructions: 1. Grill the chicken. 2. Chop lettuce and tomatoes. 3. Add dressing.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: Ground beef, onion, garlic, tomato sauce, spaghetti
instructions: 1. Brown the ground beef and onion. 2. Add garlic and tomato sauce. 3. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
instructions: 1. Toss lettuce with croutons and cheese. 2. Drizzle with Caesar dressing.

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, chicken broth, white wine
instructions: 1. Saute mushrooms. 2. Add rice and wine. 3. Gradually add broth until rice is tender.

title: Homemade Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni
instructions: 1. Roll out the pizza dough. 2. Spread tomato sauce. 3. Add cheese and pepperoni. 4. Bake until golden brown.

title: Omelette
ingredients: Eggs, cheese, bell peppers, onions, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Beat eggs. 2. Add cheese, peppers, onions, salt, and pepper. 3. Cook in a hot pan until set.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: Bread, butter, cheddar cheese
instructions: 1. Butter bread slices. 2. Add cheese between slices. 3. Grill until cheese is melted and bread is toasted.

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Chicken breast, fettuccine pasta, Alfredo sauce
instructions: 1. Cook chicken. 2. Boil pasta. 3. Mix with Alfredo sauce.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: Cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, feta cheese, olives, Greek dressing
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Add cheese and olives. 3. Drizzle with Greek dressing.

title: Sushi Rolls
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori seaweed, cucumber, avocado, fish, soy sauce
instructions: 1. Spread rice on nori. 2. Add fillings. 3. Roll and slice. Serve with soy sauce.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder
instructions: 1. Mix ingredients. 2. Pour batter onto a hot griddle. 3. Flip when bubbles form.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, balsamic glaze
instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and cheese. 2. Arrange with basil. 3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
ingredients: Beef strips, broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce, garlic, ginger
instructions: 1. Stir-fry beef with garlic and ginger. 2. Add vegetables and soy sauce. 3. Cook until tender.

title: Veggie Wrap
ingredients: Tortilla, hummus, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots
instructions: 1. Spread hummus on tortilla. 2. Add veggies. 3. Roll up and enjoy.

title: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: Salmon fillet, lemon, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. 2. Grill until cooked through.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Mixed vegetables, tofu, soy sauce, ginger, garlic
instructions: 1. Stir-fry tofu with ginger and garlic. 2. Add mixed vegetables and soy sauce. 3. Cook until tender.

title: Homemade Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ground beef, ricotta cheese, marinara sauce
instructions: 1. Cook noodles. 2. Brown beef and mix with sauce. 3. Layer noodles, beef, and ricotta. 4. Bake.

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients: Assorted fruits (e.g., strawberries, grapes, melon), honey, lime juice
instructions: 1. Slice fruits. 2. Drizzle with honey and lime juice. 3. Toss to combine.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, cheese, salsa
instructions: 1. Cook beef with taco seasoning. 2. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, lemon juice, butter, parsley
instructions: 1. Saute shrimp with garlic, lemon juice, and butter. 2. Garnish with parsley.

title: Avocado Toast
ingredients: Bread, avocado, olive oil, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes
instructions: 1. Mash avocado and spread on toasted bread. 2. Drizzle with olive oil and seasonings.

title: Mango Salsa
ingredients: Mango, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeño
instructions: 1. Dice mango, onion, and jalapeño. 2. Mix with cilantro and lime juice.

title: Beef and Broccoli
ingredients: Beef strips, broccoli florets, soy sauce, garlic, brown sugar
instructions: 1. Stir-fry beef with garlic, soy sauce, and sugar. 2. Add broccoli and cook until tender.

title: Pesto Pasta
ingredients: Pasta, basil pesto, cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese
instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Toss with pesto, tomatoes, and cheese.

title: Crispy Chicken Wings
ingredients: Chicken wings, flour, salt, pepper, oil
instructions: 1. Coat chicken wings in flour, salt, and pepper. 2. Fry until crispy and golden brown.

title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken Breast
ingredients: Chicken breast, spinach, feta cheese, garlic, olive oil
instructions: 1. Slice a pocket into the chicken breast. 2. Stuff with spinach and feta. 3. Sear in olive oil.

title: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: Baguette, tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, olive oil
instructions: 1. Slice and toast baguette. 2. Top with diced tomatoes, basil, and garlic. 3. Drizzle with olive oil.

title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: Mango, yogurt, honey, ice
instructions: 1. Blend mango, yogurt, honey, and ice until smooth.

title: Beef and Vegetable Kebabs
ingredients: Beef cubes, bell peppers, onions, zucchini, marinade
instructions: 1. Marinate beef and vegetables. 2. Thread onto skewers. 3. Grill until cooked.

title: Lentil Soup
ingredients: Lentils, onions, carrots, celery, garlic, broth
instructions: 1. Saute vegetables. 2. Add lentils and broth. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender.

title: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: Shrimp, butter, garlic, lemon juice, white wine, parsley
instructions: 1. Saute shrimp in garlic and butter. 2. Add lemon juice, white wine, and parsley.

title: Quinoa Salad
ingredients: Quinoa, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, vinaigrette
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Mix with veggies, feta, and vinaigrette.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, chocolate chips, eggs, vanilla extract
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in flour and chocolate chips. 4. Bake.

title: Cobb Salad
ingredients: Lettuce, chicken breast, bacon, eggs, tomatoes, blue cheese, vinaigrette
instructions: 1. Chop lettuce and top with grilled chicken, bacon, eggs, tomatoes, and blue cheese. 2. Drizzle with vinaigrette.

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, butter, milk, baking powder, vanilla extract
instructions: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Add wet ingredients. 3. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients: Heavy cream, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, egg yolks
instructions: 1. Heat milk, cream, and sugar until sugar dissolves. 2. Temper egg yolks and add to mixture. 3. Chill and churn in an ice cream maker.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients: Strawberries, shortcakes, whipped cream
instructions: 1. Slice strawberries and sweeten. 2. Assemble shortcakes with strawberries and whipped cream.

title: Apple Pie
ingredients: Apples, sugar, cinnamon, flour, pie crust
instructions: 1. Slice apples and mix with sugar and cinnamon. 2. Fill pie crust and bake until golden brown.

title: Raspberry Cheesecake
ingredients: Cream cheese, graham crackers, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, raspberry sauce
instructions: 1. Make graham cracker crust. 2. Mix cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. 3. Bake and top with raspberry sauce.

title: Tiramisu
ingredients: Ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, espresso, cocoa powder, eggs, sugar
instructions: 1. Dip ladyfingers in espresso. 2. Layer with mascarpone mixture. 3. Dust with cocoa powder.

title: Lemon Bars
ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, lemon juice, eggs, powdered sugar
instructions: 1. Make shortbread crust. 2. Mix lemon juice, eggs, and sugar. 3. Pour over crust and bake.

title: Popcorn
ingredients: Popcorn kernels, butter, salt
instructions: 1. Pop popcorn kernels. 2. Melt butter and drizzle over popcorn. 3. Sprinkle with salt.

title: Guacamole
ingredients: Avocados, tomatoes, onions, lime juice, cilantro, salt
instructions: 1. Mash avocados. 2. Add diced tomatoes, onions, lime juice, cilantro, and salt.

title: Hummus
ingredients: Chickpeas, tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil
instructions: 1. Blend chickpeas, tahini, garlic, and lemon juice. 2. Drizzle with olive oil.

title: Trail Mix
ingredients: Nuts, dried fruits, chocolate chips, pretzels
instructions: 1. Mix nuts, dried fruits, chocolate chips, and pretzels in a bowl.
